original_text:
they would have swallowed us alive
    when their anger flared against us;
korean_text: 그 때에 그들의 노여움이 우리에게 맹렬하여 우리를 산채로 삼켰을 것이며

sentences.original_text: they would have swallowed us alive
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 우리를 살아서 삼켜 버렸을 것

sentences.original_text: when their anger flared against us
